description: Self-proclaimed "Mage of Justice" (in the past), reluctantly became temporary teacher in the Magic Academy after being threatened by his master, Celica Arfonia. At first appears to be lazy and unmotivated magic-hater, but he actually very passionate about magic. Used to be a student at the Academy, but suddenly disappeared 4 years ago. He seemed to be in the military at least for some period of time his whereabout were unknown to the general public. It appears that he was a well-known mage killer while being in military, Rumia`s savior from three years ago, when she was kidnapped.
name: Glenn Radars
